title: Gran Criterium
text:
The Gran Criterium is a <a href="Conditions%20races">Group 2</a> <a href="Flat%20racing">flat</a> <a href="Horse%20racing">horse race</a> in <a href="Italy">Italy</a> open to two-year-old <a href="thoroughbred">thoroughbred</a> <a href="Colt%20%28horse%29">colts</a> and <a href="Filly">fillies</a>. It is run at <a href="Milan">Milan</a> over a distance of 1,500 metres (about 1 mile), and it is scheduled to take place each year in October.
The event held Group 2 status for a period in the 1970s. It was subsequently promoted, and was Italy's only Group 1 race for juvenile horses. It was downgraded back to Group 2 from 2014.
